Rules.InvariantScript:
"Welcome, "& Parent.compUser &"!
Today is: " & Concatenate(Text( Today(), "dddd" ),", ",Text( Today(), "dd/mm/yy" )) & ""
"All text fields must be completed. Correct your data according to requirements."

//Check if every text input field is filled, if not error icon and message are visible
!IsEmpty(
    Filter(
        GalleryReportData.AllItems,
        IsBlank(txtCashInItems.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtCashOutItems.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtCashInTotal.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtCashOutTotal.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtZeroBalance.Text) 
        Or Today() < DatePicker.SelectedDate
    )
) || IsEmpty(cmbApprover.SelectedItems)

//Check if every text input field is filled, if not error icon and message are visible
!IsEmpty(
    Filter(
        GalleryReportData.AllItems,
        IsBlank(txtCashInItems.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtCashOutItems.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtCashInTotal.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtCashOutTotal.Text) 
        Or IsBlank(txtZeroBalance.Text) 
        Or Today() < DatePicker.SelectedDate
    )
) || IsEmpty(cmbApprover.SelectedItems)

//Visualization for user - save button is disabled if any of text fields is empty
If(lblDataValError.Visible,DisplayMode.Disabled,DisplayMode.Edit)
"Your reported data will be sent for approval by:"
"All submitted items must be approved. Select the manager's name to start approving the workflow."

AddColumns(
    Filter(
        colUserTemplateNew,
        User.Email = User().Email
    ),
    "tempVisible",
    false
)

//Return auto populated date as usually cash statements are posted the next day
Today()-1

// uywasz te tego jednak, bo dziki temu jeli nie bdzie adnego erroru to wezmie wartosc z DatePickerNew.Y + DatePickerNew.Height + 15, a w tamtym poprzednim (nastepny kod) wzieloby tylko + 15 ;)
DatePicker.Y + DatePicker.Height + 
Max(
     If(lblZeroBalanceERROR.Visible,lblZeroBalanceERROR.Height),
     If(lblCashOutTotalERROR.Visible,lblCashOutTotalERROR.Height),
     If(lblCashInTotalERROR.Visible,lblCashInTotalERROR.Height),
     If(lblCashInItemsERROR.Visible,lblCashInItemsERROR.Height),
     If(lblStatementDateERROR.Visible,lblStatementDateERROR.Height)
 ) + 15
 
//Poprawny zapis
/*
 Max(
     lblZeroBalanceERROR.Y + lblZeroBalanceERROR.Height,
     lblCashOutTotalERROR.Y + lblCashOutTotalERROR.Height,
     lblCashInTotalERROR.Y + lblCashInTotalERROR.Height,
     lblCashInItemsERROR.Y + lblCashInItemsERROR.Height,
     lblStatementDateERROR.Y + lblStatementDateERROR.Height
 ) + 15
*/
/*
Aby zmniejszy troch kod przy zaoeniu, e kade z p bdzie miao t sam wysoko i zaczynao si na tym samym Y, moesz te zapisa tak - jedyny plus ktry widz, to taki, e sama funkcja MAX (gdzie faktycznie si co dzieje) jest bardziej czytelna, minusem jest to, e jak kto co manualne pola (warto Y) pozmienia to Ci si moe rozjecha - ale z drugiej strony to TWOJA aplikacja, wic inny deweloper powinien jej nie tyka, a jeli tak, a Ty zaprojektujesz to w taki sposb, to on powinien poprawi dalszy kod te aby dziaao. 

Kade z p DatePicuter -> txt[..] powinno si odnosi do siebie na wzajem -> Ja robi tak, e DatePicker ustawiam na sztywno, jaki Height oraz Y, a potem txtCashInItems.Y = DatePicker.Y, txtCashInItems.Height = DatePicker.Height. Do tego ErrorText.X zrobibym jako DatePicker.Y + DatePicker.Height + 10, dziki temu kady error zaczyna si na tym samym Y i moesz zastosowa poniszy kod:

DatePickerNew.Y + DatePickerNew.Height + 
Max(
     lblZeroBalanceERROR.Height,
     lblCashOutTotalERROR.Height,
     lblCashInTotalERROR.Height,
     lblCashInItemsERROR.Height,
     lblStatementDateERROR.Height
 ) + 15

Inny zapis, aby osigna to samo. Ja po prostu uwielbiam mie takie zalenoci i modyfikowa wtedy tylko DatePicker.Y + DatePicker.Height, a reszta sama si dostosowuje + od razu widz, e szukasz Max wysokoci txtError, dla mnie osobicie troch bardziej przejrzyste. Ty musisz zadecydowa sama ;) Preferencje danego programisty tu ju wjedzj (poza tym, e oblicze mniej oczywicie)

*/
/*
Zapis z Or => Chyba nie bdzie dziaa i tak ale tak zapisujemy OR'y
Or(
    Max(lblZeroBalanceERROR.Y + lblZeroBalanceERROR.Height) + 15,
    Max(lblCashOutTotalERROR.Y + lblCashOutTotalERROR.Height, lblCashInTotalERROR.Y + lblCashInTotalERROR.Height) + 15,
    Max(lblCashOutItemsERROR.Y + lblCashOutItemsERROR.Height, lblCashInItemsERROR.Y + lblCashInItemsERROR.Height) + 15,
    Max(lblStatementDateERROR.Y + lblStatementDateERROR.Height) + 15,
)
*/
/*


/*
Zapis z || zamiast Or - chyba jak wyej i niej, nie zadziaa
Max(lblZeroBalanceERROR.Y + lblZeroBalanceERROR.Height) + 15
|| Max(lblCashOutTotalERROR.Y + lblCashOutTotalERROR.Height, lblCashInTotalERROR.Y + lblCashInTotalERROR.Height) + 15
|| Max(lblCashOutItemsERROR.Y + lblCashOutItemsERROR.Height, lblCashInItemsERROR.Y + lblCashInItemsERROR.Height) + 15
|| Max(lblStatementDateERROR.Y + lblStatementDateERROR.Height) + 15
*/

/*
KAROLINY ZAPIS
Max(lblZeroBalanceERROR.Y + lblZeroBalanceERROR.Height) + 15
Or Max(lblCashOutTotalERROR.Y + lblCashOutTotalERROR.Height, lblCashInTotalERROR.Y + lblCashInTotalERROR.Height) + 15
Or Max(lblCashOutItemsERROR.Y + lblCashOutItemsERROR.Height, lblCashInItemsERROR.Y + lblCashInItemsERROR.Height) + 15
Or Max(lblStatementDateERROR.Y + lblStatementDateERROR.Height) + 15
*/
//(Parent.TemplateHeight - 1, lblAccNoNew.Y + lblAccNoNew.Height + 10)
"Date must be equal or earlier than today's date!"

//Error message displayed to the user when the selected date is later than today
If(Today() < DatePicker.SelectedDate, true)
"Enter an integer. If there is no data for a given statement date, enter zero."

//Error message displayed to the user when the user's input is not matching IsMatch condition
If(!IsBlank(txtCashInItems.Text) && !IsMatch(
    txtCashInItems.Text,
    "\d+"), true,false)
"Enter a positive currency amount with two decimal places. If there is no data for a given statement date, enter zero."

//Error message displayed to the user when the user's input is not matching IsMatch condition
If(!IsBlank(txtCashInTotal.Text) && !IsMatch(
    txtCashInTotal.Text,
    "\d+(\.\d\d)?"),true,false)
"Enter an integer. If there is no data for a given statement date, enter zero."
"Enter a positive currency amount with two decimal places. If there is no data for a given statement date, enter zero."

//Error message displayed to the user when the user's input is not matching IsMatch condition
!IsBlank(txtCashOutTotal.Text) && !IsMatch(txtCashOutTotal.Text,"\d+(\.\d\d)?")
"Enter a positive OR negative currency amount with two decimal places. If there is no zero balance transaction for a given statement date, enter zero."

//Error message displayed to the user when the user's input is not matching IsMatch condition
!IsBlank(txtZeroBalance.Text) && !IsMatch(txtZeroBalance.Text,"(-)?\d+(\.\d\d)?")
